amendment.description: Amendment requires a scientific and economic analysis of the FDA's Food Safety and Modernization Act prior to final regulations being enforced with the focus of the analysis being on the impact of the bill on agricultural businesses of all sizes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 51 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to require a scientific and economic analysis of the FDA's Food Safety and Modernization Act prior to final regulations being enforced with the focus of the analysis being on the impact of the bill on agricultural businesses of all sizes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
